page.title: 09Employment and Recreation
page.content: Most men work as farmers or farmworkers.12 people work at Farm Pak packing, cutting and delivering meat.Some women clean farm houses, the Clive Memorial Church House, the school and the church.A man cuts the grass in the churchyard every so often.7 people are employed at the school.A few people work in neighbouring towns and very few are unemployed.Some people, often older boys and girls, deliver daily newspapers. Outdoor activities enjoyed by people in the area include hunting, horse riding, shooting, car racing, bowling, tennis, running, walking, gardening, cycling, fishing, and golf. Other people enjoy indoor activities which are sewing, knitting, cooking, snooker, pool, dominoes, darts, and playing cards.
